data.name: HIGO Party
data.description:
HIGO Party is an all-age social competitive VR game that focuses on multiplayer social networking and trendy cross-dressing. In the world of HIGO Party, players can create a changeable and beautiful self, and they can dress up themselves through personalized clothing. Here, they can not only use rich and interesting gestures and expressions to shorten the distance between players in the virtual world, but also turn black with friends, and experience the fun of VR in shooting and boxing games.

Generate your own unique avatar through custom face pinching, and match any combination of tops, pants/skirts, shoes, headgear, and glasses to create a personalized shape.
first use the full avatar virtual image, combined with 6dof, so that the "you" in the game can be synchronized with the real you, and the perfect replica.
In the HIGO Social Square, you can not only chat with friends from all over the world, but also play chess together, fight bulls on the basketball court, compete with various fancy dunks, and have a dream stage for you to show your dancing moves.
Fun and fun shooting bureau: four kinds of shooting gameplay are different, many people fight and six people scuffle; mutation factory 1v5 asymmetric boss; team deathmatch 3v3 red and blue battle; crystal attack and defense 3 people form a team to protect our crystal! There are also a variety of random props in the bureau to help you become the king of guns!
